title: Wireshark - Bluetooth LE decoding a HCI Log
content:
I have a bluetooth LE home automation style device, that connects to a mobile app. There are 2 values which are updated roughly every second. I'm trying to extract these numbers from the payload. I've narrowed the frames down to these examples below. 

00-02-7B-02-9E-00-0F-3B-84-DD-30
00-02-7C-02-A8-00-0F-3B-84-DD-30
00-02-7C-02-A9-00-0F-3B-84-DD-30
00-02-7B-02-A2-00-0F-3B-85-60-42
00-02-7C-02-AD-00-0F-3B-85-1E-B9

The 2 numbers I'm trying to extract should be a PSI/bar/other pressure value of around 50psi/339bar and the other should be between 1 and 5ish.

It looks like the values are split on the 00 in the hex.

I've been using this tool hex to int converter to try and split the hex up, but I can't get the values I'm expecting.
